text: Hi A, what has gotten you stressed?
author: Person

text: Hi all, I have been having some issues with anxiety these past of days. I am not to sure what to do.
author: A

text: Thank you so much for the advice. I will take a break and listen to some music!
author: Anonymus Student

text: Sometimes you perform the best when you take a break, so I definetly agree with Juan on this. It has helped me many times too.
author: Rose

text: Do you think that I have enough time to do all of that? I am worried that I will fail my test if I don't study.
author: Anonymus Student

text: I recommend taking a step back and the doing something you enjoy. I know you have a lot you need to do, but it works better sometimes if you clear your mind. Meditate, listen to music, or whatever else you enjoy doing.
author: Juan

text: That does seem like a lot of pressure.
author: Juan

text: I have a lot of school assignments due and I just feel overwhelmed with the pressure to do well and also still excel in sports as well. I have a basketball competition coming up and I am also need to practice for that as well.
author: Anonymus Student

text: Hi Anonymus Student, what are you stressed about exactly, classes, expectations, sports,etc?
author: Juan

text: Hi all I feel overwhelmed with school, and I do not know what to do?
author: Anonymus Student
